description: This source file defines a TemplateService class that provides methods to interact with a templates API, including CRUD operations, rendering, validation, testing, and importing/exporting templates.

classes.name: TemplateService
classes.description: A class that encapsulates methods to manage templates through API calls.

methods.name: getTemplates
methods.description: Retrieve a paginated list of templates with optional search term.

methods.name: getTemplate
methods.description: Retrieve a specific template by ID.

methods.name: createTemplate
methods.description: Create a new template with provided data.

methods.name: updateTemplate
methods.description: Update an existing template identified by ID.

methods.name: renderTemplate
methods.description: Render a template with specified variables.

methods.name: validateTemplate
methods.description: Validate the syntax of a template.

methods.name: testTemplate
methods.description: Test a template with a specific test case.

methods.name: runAllTests
methods.description: Run all test cases for a template.

methods.name: getTemplatesByDevice
methods.description: Retrieve templates filtered by device type.

methods.name: cloneTemplate
methods.description: Clone an existing template with a new name.

methods.name: exportTemplate
methods.description: Export a template as a file.

methods.name: importTemplate
methods.description: Import a template from a file.

methods.name: getTemplateVariables
methods.description: Get variables defined in a template.

methods.name: addTestCase
methods.description: Add a new test case to a template.

methods.name: updateTestCase
methods.description: Update a specific test case for a template.

methods.name: deleteTestCase
methods.description: Delete a test case from a template.
